mapper.select:
SELECT pblcn_cpn_id, cpn_nm, dscnt_vl, min_ordr_amt, max_dscnt_amt, vld_end_dt, vld_bgng_dt, crt_dt FROM coupons c WHERE c.actvtn_yn = 1 AND c.pblcn_cpn_id NOT IN (SELECT pblcn_cpn_id FROM user_coupons WHERE user_no = #{userNo})
AND c.cpn_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY
c.vld_end_dt ASC c.dscnt_vl DESC
c.vld_bgng_dt DESC c.vld_bgng_dt DESC
c.vld_bgng_dt DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

/* 발급 가능한 쿠폰의 전체 개수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM coupons WHERE actvtn_yn = 1 AND pblcn_cpn_id NOT IN (SELECT pblcn_cpn_id FROM user_coupons WHERE user_no = #{userNo})
AND cpn_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

/* 사용자가 보유한 쿠폰의 전체 개수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_coupons uc JOIN coupons c ON uc.pblcn_cpn_id = c.pblcn_cpn_id WHERE uc.user_no = #{userNo}
AND c.cpn_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: /* 사용자에게 쿠폰 발급 처리 */ INSERT INTO user_coupons (user_cpn_id, user_no, pblcn_cpn_id, use_yn, cpn_give_dt, indiv_expry_dt, issu_rsn_src_cn) VALUES (#{userCpnId}, #{userNo}, #{pblcnCpnId}, 0, NOW(), #{indivExpryDt}, '사용자 발급')
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(u.birth_date, INTERVAL 3 DAY), '%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(u.birth_date, INTERVAL 3 DAY), '%m-%d') THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_in_birthday_week FROM users u WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo}
